A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: its a no brainier what is wrong with this movie\, but to sum it up without repeating what others have previously written - spaceballs 2 not Star Wars. This is a fine example of making a film and not knowing your audience. \n\nImagine they did another Harry Potter with a new main character that instantly knew everything and school wasn't required - just undermines the previous hp films and that is what sw8 has done regarding this saga.
